channel.title: Run Server Error?
channel.description:
I fixed my run server error.. but
When I run my client for my server it says the js5 connect error thing or w/e.

item.title: Run Server Error?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Wayne Owner Wayne
item.description:
@Owner_Wayne wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:312963"][quote]
This is a simple error which is commonly occurring on 508 server protocols, it is when your client cannot connect to the update server, which basically means that the server you are trying to connect to is offline.

If you are trying to connect to a server that is not yours, either, check if the server is online, or if you’ve entered its IP correctly.

If you are trying to connect to a server you are hosting, make sure the IP is entered correctly, make sure you run your server before the client.
[/quote][/quote]
Its my server
its online
and it dont work…

Read full topic
